attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Chavs are a blight on British society causing endless social disorder in our towns. The good people of Britain should have the right to be free of such people. We therefore ask that being a chav be made a criminal offence with severe penalties. Or at least put them all out of the way together in a newly created "chav town" from which they cannot escape.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
